db:abstract.db:para: A representation of links within a PDF document.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: PdfLinkModel provides the geometry and the destination for each link that the specified page contains.

db:td.db:para: If the link is a web link, the URL for that; otherwise an empty URL.
If the link is an internal link, the page number to which the link should jump; otherwise -1.
If the link is an internal link, the location on the page to which the link should jump.
If the link is an internal link, the intended zoom level on the destination page.

db:section.db:para: Normally it will be used with Repeater to visualize the links and provide the ability to click them:

db:note.db:para: General-purpose PDF viewing capabilities are provided by PdfScrollablePageView and PdfMultiPageView. PdfLinkModel is only needed when building PDF view components from scratch.

db:section.db:title: document : PdfDocument
db:section.db:para: This property holds the PDF document in which links are to be found.

db:section.db:title: page : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the page number on which links are to be found.
